    FloatingPoissonFaultSource
    Title: FloatingPoissonFaultSource
    Forecast
    A Forecast is the top-level wrapper for earthquake source definitions used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses and calculations (PSHAs).
    GridSourceSet
    A set of evenly spaced (point) Sources with varying magnitudes derived a GR MFD at each grid node.
    GridSourceSet.Builder

    Loader
    TODO logging TODO if multithreaded forecast loading is adopted, new parsers and handlers should be initialized on a per-thread basis
    MagUncertainty
    Wrapper class for magnitude uncertainty data.
    Rupture
    A Rupture is a proxy for an actual earthquake and encapsulates all the source information required by a ground motion model (GMM).
    Sources
    Source factory.
